title: [Abandoned Church, Pulpit]
description: Once able to overlook the entire church, sections of the roof have since collapsed and block the view.  Through the holes in the roof, the darkness from outside pours into the church.  Several old crates are scattered across the floor nearby a short flight of steps that lead back down to the nave.

Once able to overlook the entire church, sections of the roof have since collapsed and block the view.  Through the holes in the roof, the darkness from outside pours into the church.  Several old crates and boxes are scattered across the floor nearby a short flight of steps that lead back down to the nave.
